page.title: 16LIFE STYLES
page.content: Amenities can be said to be limited for villagers as basic day to day needs are outside the village.A small village school for primary age group operates just outside our area as does the Village church.A Post Office cum gro- cers shop in village centre supplies many basic goods but the local inn "The Rising Sun" probably provides most services for visitors to the village. The leisure centres & Country Club point to a change of times for Fawkham, originally a hop producing valley, now offering facilities for leisure instead Horse riding stables,a private football club-The Corinthian Club for Boys run by local farmer & millionaire Mr.R. Billings,boarding kennels,private clinics,a naturist club,a rodeo club & camping sites now form the main amenities.
